rewrite1:
Please make the following adjustments to the ninth paragraph in your Word document:

- Change the alignment to right-align.
- Introduce a negative 2-centimeter indent on the right side.
- Change the font color to Purple.
- Set the line spacing to 1.5 lines.
- Highlight the text with a yellow color.
- Switch the font to Microsoft YaHei.
- Increase the space following the paragraph to 1 centimeter.
- Format the paragraph using Outline Level 5.
